profile.aboutMe: I am Mohammad Habib, a passionate Front-End Developer with over two years of continuous learning in programming. I started with a foundation course in programming, then moved into web development, where I gained solid experience in building interactive and responsive websites. I have strong skills in React.js, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap, and other modern front-end tools, along with a good understanding of UI/UX principles. I am always eager to enhance my skills and work on real-world projects to deliver high-quality user experiences.
profile.profilText: My name is Mohamed Habib, a 22-year-old Front-End Developer with exI am Mohamed Habib, a 22-year-old Front-End Developer skilled in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap, and TypeScript. I have experience building responsive, interactive websites and a strong focus on delivering high-quality user experiences using modern UI/UX principles.
profile.skillsText: I have strong skills in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, with a solid understanding of the latest front-end development technologies. I also work with modern frameworks and libraries such as React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Bootstrap to build responsive and interactive web applications. Currently, I am expanding my knowledge by learning additional modern tools and frameworks to enhance my development expertise.
